loan_canister.build: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release --manifest-path src/loan_canister/Cargo.toml && ic-wasm src/loan_canister/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/loan_canister.wasm -o src/loan_canister/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/loan_canister_opt.wasm metadata candid:service -f src/loan_canister/loan_canister.did

oracle_canister.build: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release --manifest-path src/oracle_canister/Cargo.toml && ic-wasm src/oracle_canister/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/oracle_canister.wasm -o src/oracle_canister/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/oracle_canister_opt.wasm metadata candid:service -f src/oracle_canister/oracle_canister.did

btc_token_canister.build: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release --manifest-path src/btc_token_canister/Cargo.toml && ic-wasm src/btc_token_canister/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/btc_token_canister.wasm -o src/btc_token_canister/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/btc_token_canister_opt.wasm metadata candid:service -f src/btc_token_canister/btc_token_canister.did

iusd_token_canister.build: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release --manifest-path src/iusd_token_canister/Cargo.toml && ic-wasm src/iusd_token_canister/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/iusd_token_canister.wasm -o src/iusd_token_canister/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/iusd_token_canister_opt.wasm metadata candid:service -f src/iusd_token_canister/iusd_token_canister.did
